languages.text: {n}Издав грозный боевой клич, брат Тарзус с невообразимой для его размеров быстротой вскидывает оружие.{/n} "Да воздастся презревшим процедуру по грехам их!"

{n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"
languages.original_text: {n}Издав грозный боевой клич, брат Тарзус с невообразимой для его размеров быстротой вскидывает оружие.{/n} "Да воздастся презревшим процедуру по грехам их!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battlecry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure get the wages of their sin!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}同胞ターザスが恐ろしい鬨の声をあげると、驚くほどの素早さで、自分自身ほどの大きさの相手に武器を振り上げた。{/n}「手順を拒否する者には、その冒涜に相応の見返りをくれてやる！」
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}同胞ターザスが恐ろしい鬨の声をあげると、驚くほどの素早さで、自分自身ほどの大きさの相手に武器を振り上げた。{/n}「手順を拒否する者には、その冒涜に相応の見返りをくれてやる！」
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}塔塔祖斯发出了可怕的咆哮声，举起了手中的武器。对他这种大块头而言，他的动作敏捷得令人惊异。{/n}“那些蔑视正义程序的人，要为他们的亵渎行为付出代价！”
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}塔塔祖斯发出了可怕的咆哮声，举起了手中的武器。对他这种大块头而言，他的动作敏捷得令人惊异。{/n}“那些蔑视正义程序的人，要为他们的亵渎行为付出代价！”
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Bruder Tarzus stößt einen durchdringenden Kampfschrei aus und erhebt seine Waffe mit einer für jemanden seiner Größe erstaunlichen Schnelligkeit.{/n} "Wer sich sich dem Vorgang verweigert, soll die Früchte seiner Gottlosigkeit ernten!"
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bruder Tarzus stößt einen schrecklichen Kampfschrei aus und erhebt seine Waffe mit einer für jemanden seiner Größe erstaunlichen Schnelligkeit.{/n} "Wer sich sich dem Vorgang verweigert, soll den Lohn für seine Gottlosigkeit erhalten!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Frère Tarzus pousse un cri de guerre terrifiant et brandit son arme avec une rapidité surprenante pour un individu de cette taille.{/n} « Quiconque déroge à la procédure récolte les fruits de son sacrilège ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Frère Tarzus pousse un cri de guerre terrifiant et brandit son arme avec une rapidité surprenante pour un individu de cette taille.{/n} « Quiconque déroge à la procédure récolte les fruits de son sacrilège ! »
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}El hermano Tarzus profiere un terrorífico grito de guerra y enarbola su arma con una rapidez asombrosa para alguien de su tamaño.{/n} «¡Quienes osan desdeñar la santidad de este procedimiento recogerán lo que su sacrilegio ha sembrado!».
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hermano Tarzus profiere un terrorífico grito de guerra y enarbola su arma con una rapidez asombrosa para alguien de su tamaño.{/n} «¡Quienes osan desdeñar la santidad de este procedimiento recogerán lo que su blasfemia ha sembrado!».
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Kardeş Tarzus, dehşet verici bir savaş çığlığı atıyor ve cüssesinden beklenmeyecek bir çeviklikle silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Prosedürü hiçe sayanlar, dine hürmetsizlik etmenin meyvelerini toplayacaktır!"
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Tarzus lets out a terrifying battle cry and raises his weapon with an amazing alacrity for someone of his size.{/n} "Let those who have spurned the procedure reap the fruits of their sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kardeş Tarzus dehşet verici bir savaş çığlığı atıyor ve cüssesinden beklenmeyecek muazzam bir çeviklikle silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Prosedürü hiçe sayanlar, dine küfretmelerinin meyvelerini toplayacaktırlar!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus
